message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is depreciation.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see that there is a line item explicitly labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 45742.50 on 2024-01-31.

Depreciation represents the systematic allocation of the cost of tangible assets over their useful lives, which matches the description in the task.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45742.50'} }
```
